commandDescription: ## Displays your current balance and purchased skin packs!
## Do all the tasks to earn coins!
## Claim your daily reward once a day!
## Displays the leaderboard by the number of mope coins!
## The leaderboard is updated every 2 minutes!
## Usage: `{PREFIX}leaderboard (<page>) (<rows>)`
### `page` - page to display
### `rows` - number of rows to display per page
## Here you can purchase any skin pack you desire.
### Note that some commands may not utilize certain packs.
## Vote Mopey on Top.gg to earn coins!
## Claim your weekly reward once a week!
## Enter the arena to claim your reward!
## Use this command to collect beachballs!
### Current rarities:
{BEACHBALLS_RARITIES}
## Wager your coins on heads or tails for a chance to win!
### `all` - the maximum allowable bet (`{MAX_COINFLIP_BET}`{EMOJI})
### `side` - the side of the coin, either heads or tails. If no side is specified, it defaults to heads
### Usage: `{PREFIX}coinflip (<amount>|all) (h|t)`
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Shows how much rares you'd get in real 1 Hour Luck Challenge!
### Use `{PREFIX}simulator event` to simulate in event mode!
## Displays how lucky you are today!
## Attempt to transform into a mighty King Dragon and claim your reward!
### Additionally, there is a 1/1000 chance of becoming a King Dragon by sheer luck!
## Use this command to collect pumpkins!
### Current rarities:
{PUMPKINS_RARITIES}
## Shows random rare!
## Use this command to attempt catching some rares!
## Displays the current raretry mode. You can switch modes by pressing the buttons!
### The higher the active mode, the greater the rewards!
## Attempt to obtain rares while progressing from a mouse to a black dragon!
## The rarities are identical to those in the game!
## Wager your coins for a chance to win!
### `all` - the maximum allowable bet (`{MAX_SLOTS_BET}`{EMOJI})
### Usage: `{PREFIX}slots (<amount>|all)`
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Use this command to discover various disasters!
### There is currently 1/30 chance to discover devil disasters!
## Use this command to collect umbrellas!
### Current rarities:
{UMBRELLAS_RARITIES}
## Displays the most recent announcement!
# ❗ WARNING ❗
## __This command will clear all your {EMOJI}!__
## Displays a list of all contributors to the bot's development!
## Invite the Mopey bot to your server, join the Mopey server, and vote for Mopey!
## Performs calculations based on the provided input.
### Some arguments may not be supported!
### Usage: `{PREFIX}math <arguments>`
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Displays the Mopey User Identifier along with their current coin balance!
### Usage: `{PREFIX}muid <number>`
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Displays the bot's latency in milliseconds.
## Changes the bot's prefix for your server.
### Required permissions: `Manage Server` or `Administrator`
### Usage: `{PREFIX}prefix <newPrefix>`
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Simulates raretry command.
### Usage: `{PREFIX}raretrysimulator (<raretry_mode>) (<number_of_attempts>)`
### `<raretry_mode>` - Mode of raretry. All available modes can be seen in `{PREFIX}raretrymode` command.
### `<number_of_attempts>` - Number of attempts to simulate. Default number is `100`, maximum is `1000`, and minimum is `1`.
## Shows reminders.
### Press on button to enable or disable a reminder.
## If you encounter a bug or notice a user attempting to disrupt the bot through alts, spamming, or other means, use the Report command to notify us!
## Shows the rules you agreed with!
## Shows and edits your current timezone! Required for the proper functioning of time functions!
### Usage: `{PREFIX}timezone <TimezoneID>`
## {HYPERLINK_TIMEZONES}
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Play and earn coins. Still in development, many features may be added in the future!
## Allows you to equip purchased skins on your animals!
### Usage: `{PREFIX}wardrobe [new|all|<tier>|<animal>]`
### `[new]` - Starts a new equiping animals with chosen skin for mouse to king dragon process
### `[all]` - Equips every animal with chosen skin pack
### `[tier]` - Equips every chosen animal tier with chosen skin pack
### `[animal]` - Equips chosen animal with chosen skin
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Displays the current rare chart for the 1-hour Luck Challenge!
### What is the 1-hour Luck Challenge? Its a game where you have to get rares in <https://mope.io>! Start from a mouse and try getting rares for 1 hour!
### For better experience, use the bot to track your progress! The bot will count your points from every rare you caught and wrote!
### More information is in the `{PREFIX}help start` command!
### Use `{PREFIX}chart event` to see the event chart!
## Counts points!
### No need to participate in a 1 hour Luck Challenge, instead you need to write all the names of rare animals in one message!
### Example: `{PREFIX}count kbt cht mar...`
## You have 2 options: __Add new page__ or __Edit existing page__
## 1. If you chose __Add new page__, a new menu with all available options will appear.
## 2. If you chose __Edit existing page__, you will need to provide the page you want to edit and sorting type.
### - These options are: `Points`, `Rares`, `Play Type`, `Difficulty`, `End Date` and `List of Rares`
### - `List of Rares` option is updating the list, so it's not removing previous rares
### - To remove a rare, set its count to `0`
## Edits your list of rare animals in 1 hour Luck Challenge!
### Usage: `{PREFIX}editlist <rare> [+ | -] <quantity>`
### Example: `{PREFIX}editlist mar + 1` -> Adds 1 Markhor to your list
### Example: `{PREFIX}editlist mar - all` -> Removes all Markhors from your list
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Edits your time in 1 hour Luck Challenge!
### Usage: `{PREFIX}edittime [<MM:SS> | <seconds>]` (time passed)
### Example: `{PREFIX}edittime 30:00`
### Example: `{PREFIX}edittime 1800`
{BRACKETS_INFO}
## Instantly ends your 1 hour Luck Challenge! Also displays your score!
### Does not add the result to your history!
## Shows your history of all ended 1 Hour Luck Challenges!
## Shows your settings related to 1 Hour Luck Challenge which you can edit!
## Creates a new Lobby, and anyone who wishes can join your Lobby and participate in the Co-op 1 Hour Luck Challenge! A maximum of {MAX_PARTICIPANTS} participants.
### `1`. Press the 'Join' button to enter the Lobby.
### `2`. Press the 'Ready' button whenever you're ready.
### `3`. Press the 'Exit' button to leave the Lobby.
### `4`. Press the 'Start' button (for hosts only) to begin the Challenge! A minimum of 2 participants is required.
### `5`. Press the 'End' button (for hosts only) to close the Lobby and cancel participation in the Challenge.
## __Notes:__
### After pressing the 'Start' button, a countdown will appear, and then you will be able to start trying to get rares in Mope.io.
### Each participant has their own timer.
### After all participants have completed their challenge either forcibly or after timer's end, the participant with the highest number of points wins.
## Pauses your 1 hour Luck Challenge!
## Shows your current points!
## Continues your 1 hour Luck Challenge!
## Displays «Shorter Names Of Rare Animals»
### Used only for 1 hour luck challenge commands
## Starts your 1 hour Luck Challenge!
### While in progress, you must write names of rares from `{PREFIX}snora` without prefix to earn points!
### Example: `mar cht kbt pf mud ...`
### Once the timer is up, a confirmation message will appear. Click the «Confirm» button to complete your 1 hour Luck Challenge
## Shows the time remaining in the 1 hour Luck Challenge!
